interpretation: The "carousel horse" emoji represents nostalgia, fun, and playfulness. It encourages you to embrace your inner child and enjoy the present moment. It reminds you to appreciate the beauty in the simple things in life and to find joy in the journey, not just the destination. This card can also suggest that you may be feeling a bit restless or stuck in a rut, and that it's time to break free and explore new experiences. The carousel horse invites you to let go of your worries and fears and to trust in the universe to guide you towards your dreams. Trust in the magic of life and enjoy the ride!
